Lastly, having access to financial advice from experts would be a valuable resource for me.

Additionally, if the new service had better security measures and a more user-friendly interface, I would be more likely to switch. Lastly, if the new service offered better interest rates or lower fees, that would also be a factor in my decision to switch.

I need a service that is intuitive and easy to use, so I can quickly access my account information, make transactions, and manage my finances on-the-go.
